org.hps.analysis.MC

Class MCFullDetectorTruth

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.analysis.MC.MCFullDetectorTruth

  • public class MCFullDetectorTruth
extends Object
    This is the driver that takes a TrackTruthMatching object and computes the full truth information including scattering angles
